prompt: La cloche en haut à droite n'est pas disponible, même lorsque l'extension "Notification d'alerte" est installée.
expected_answer: Assurez-vous que les notifications sont activées dans votre wiki. Vous pouvez les activer en définissant la propriété `notifications.enabled` dans `xwiki.properties` sur `true`.
ai_answer:
https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/ 
https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Notifications%20Application/ 
https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/XWikiSyntax/ 


It seems like you're having trouble with the notifications bell icon in your XWiki platform, even after installing the "Notification Alert" extension.

The notifications feature in XWiki can be customized and managed through various macros. These macros allow you to display notifications, manage notifications applications preferences, auto-watched pages, custom filters, and email preferences.

However, the issue you're facing might not be related to these macros. The notifications bell icon might be related to a specific application, such as the Notifications Application. Based on the information you provided, it seems that you have correctly installed the Notifications Application.

If the notifications bell icon is still not available, you might want to check the following:

1. Make sure you have the correct permissions: Ensure that your user account has the necessary permissions to view and manage notifications.
2. Clear your browser cache: Sometimes, issues like this can be caused by browser caching. Try clearing your browser cache and then refreshing the page.
3. Check for JavaScript errors: Open your browser's developer console and look for any JavaScript errors that might be preventing the notifications bell icon from displaying.
4. Verify your XWiki version: Ensure that you are using a compatible version of XWiki with the Notifications Application and the "Notification Alert" extension.

If none of these steps help, you may want to reach out to the XWiki community or the support team for further assistance. They can help you diagnose and resolve the issue with the notifications bell icon.

sources.content:
![text_list_bullets](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/resources/icons/silk/text_list_bullets.png?cache-version=1711538036000)

[Menu](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Menu%20Application)  
Menu application

![bell](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/resources/icons/silk/bell.png?cache-version=1711538036000)

[Notifications](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Notifications%20Application/)  
Display notifications about events happening in the wiki.

![invitation.png](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Extension/Invitation%20Application/invitation.png?rev=1.3)

[Invitation](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Invitation%20Application)  
Allows users to send emails, inviting friends and colleagues to join a wiki

# Other Features

Other features can be added to your wiki by [installing](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Extension%20Manager%20Application) extensions not listed above. Check the [Extensions wiki](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/) for a full list of available extensions.

## Emails

You can also select some types of notifications that you will receive by email. You can have different choices enabled by email and in the menu. Then, on the very bottom of the page, you can select the interval between 2 emails. For example, if you choose "Daily" (default), you will receive one email every day with the recap of the events that have happened during the day. Of course, if there were no activity in this period of time, no email is sent. 

Live notifications emails can be sent to a user. The wiki administrator can also define a "grace time" for live email notifications ; when an event that triggers a notification is sent, the platform will wait for the duration of this grace time before sending a notification email. If during this interval, a new event of the same kind is sent, the two events will be grouped in the same email. You can get more informations on how to configure this feature [here](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Notifications%20Application/#HCustomizeliveemailnotificationsgracetime).

Of course, it works only if the user has properly filled her e-mail address.

You can edit the frequency of your email notifications by using the selector just at the bottom of the notification preferences pane in your profile page :

![notificationPreferencesEmailUI.png](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Extension/Notifications%20Application/WebHome/notificationPreferencesEmailUI.png?rev=1.4)

The notifications are sorted by pages and dates, and a table of content summarizes all notifications contained in the email:

![NotifEmailTOC.png](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Extension/Notifications%20Application/WebHome/NotifEmailTOC.png?rev=1.3)

A breadcrumb is displayed on top of each notification that concern a page:

![NotifEmailBreadcrumb.png](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Extension/Notifications%20Application/WebHome/NotifEmailBreadcrumb.png?rev=1.3)

| [notifications](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/Notifications/Code/Macro/NotificationsMacro) | Notifications | Notifications | Display notifications about events happened on the wiki. | Current Wiki |
| [notificationsApplicationsPreferences](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/Notifications/Code/NotificationsApplicationsPreferencesMacro) | Notifications Applications Preferences | Notifications | Display the preferences of the current user about notification applications. | Current Wiki |
| [notificationsAutoWatchPreferences](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/Notifications/Code/NotificationsAutoWatchPreferencesMacro) | Notifications Auto Watch Preferences | Notifications | Display the preferences of the current user about auto watched pages. | Current Wiki |
| [notificationsCustomFiltersPreferences](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/Notifications/Code/NotificationsCustomFiltersPreferencesMacro) | Notifications Custom Filters Preferences | Notifications | Display the preferences of the given user about custom notification filters. | Current Wiki |
| [notificationsEmailPreferences](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/Notifications/Code/NotificationsEmailPreferencesMacro) | Notifications Email Preferences | Notifications | Display the preferences of the current user about notification emails. | Current Wiki |
| [notificationsFiltersPreferences](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/Notifications/Code/NotificationsFiltersPreferencesMacro) | Notifications Filters Preferences (deprecated) | Notifications | Display the preferences of the current user about notification filters.This macro is now deprecated in favor of Custom Notifications Filters Preferences or System Notifications Filters Preferences. | Current Wiki |
